mapper.select: select t_shelves.*,t_depot.name as depotName from t_depot,t_shelves where t_shelves.delete_flg=0 and t_shelves.depot_id=t_depot.depot_id and t_depot.business_id=#{bid}
select * from t_shelves where 1=1 and delete_flg = 0 and depot_id = #{depotId}

SELECT a.`name` as name, IFNULL(SUM(b.nums), 0) as total_num,a.shelves_id as shelves_id,a.depot_id FROM t_shelves a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(c.nums) AS nums, c.shelves_id as shelves_id FROM t_stock c WHERE c.delete_flg = 0 AND c.warehouse_id = #{bid} GROUP BY c.shelves_id
) b on a.shelves_id = b.shelves_id GROUP BY a.shelves_id

SELECT a.shelves_id,c.`name` as goods_name,c.sku,c.barcode,b.username as business_name,a.nums from t_stock a LEFT JOIN t_user b on a.business_id = b.business_id LEFT JOIN t_goods c on a.goods_id = c.goods_id LEFT JOIN t_goods_category d on c.category_id = d.id WHERE a.warehouse_id = #{warehouseId} and a.shelves_id = #{shelvesId} and a.delete_flg = 0 ORDER BY a.new_date
